description: Fitzdog Radio! A place where Greg can continue his Sirius / XM Show on Howard 101, and give you more interview time with the guest, and more funny.
title: Fitzdog Radio

episodes.title: Aunty Donna - Episode 884
episodes.description:
Australia has given us a gift! I chat with the sketch group Aunty Donna who have a new show coming out on Netflix. Hilarious.

Follow Aunty Donna on Twitter @AuntyDonnaBoys

episodes.title: David Wild - Episode 883
episodes.description:
Music critic, writer and great podcast guest David Wild ranks music and drops names of people he has amazing stories about working with some of the biggest names in music history.

 

Follow David Wild on Twitter @WildAboutMusic

episodes.title: The Sklar Brothers - Episode 882
episodes.description:
A three way w/ the Sklar Brothers Jason and Randy talk sports, religion and why a standing ovation might be better than sex (unless it is from your wife after sex).

Follow Randy and Jason on Twitter @SklarBrothers

episodes.title: Judy Gold - Episode 881
episodes.description:
This week, NY Jew Judy Gold defends a comedian's right to say whatever the fuck they want.

 

Follow Judy on Twitter @JewdyGold

episodes.title: Bob Saget - Episode 880
episodes.description:
Hollywood royalty Bob Saget talks religion and NYC public access porn in the 80s.

 

Follow Bob on Twitter @BobSaget

episodes.title: Nate Bargatze - Episode 879
episodes.description:
Nashville’s Nate Bargatze tells me about getting tased on a Fla radio show. I admit to being water boarded by Ari Shaffir. 

 

Follow Nate on Twitter @NateBargatze

episodes.title: Colin Quinn - Episode 878
episodes.description:
Renaissance comedian Colin Quinn doesn’t want any “Woke” people or anyone donning a MAGA hat in his audience. Just show up and shut up.

 

Follow Colin on Twitter @IamColinQuinn

episodes.title: Tom Segura - Episode 877
episodes.description:
Tom & I talk about when I tortured Jimmy Fallon in Las Vegas and where Tom ranks farts in the scope of life (hint: very high).

 

Follow Tom on Twitter @TomSegura

episodes.title: Steve-O - Episode 876
episodes.description:
Your hero Steve-O is on this week! He was funny and honest & what is better than that?

 

Follow Steve-O on Twitter @SteveO

episodes.title: Bobby Kelly - Episode 875
episodes.description:
From his man-cave in NY Bobby Kelly and Greg get deep into the show ALONE and by extension how improbable it is that they are both not.

 

Follow Bobby on Twitter @RobertKelly

episodes.title: Tony Rock - Episode 874
episodes.description:
Tony and I celebrate our rise to the middle of show business and our desire to stay right there. Fame is for suckers.

 

Follow Tony on Twitter @TonyRock

episodes.title: Ron Funches - Episode 873
episodes.description:
Comedy sweetheart Ron Funches talks about doing Zoom comedy shows and how he has saved for this rainy day. 

 

 

Follow Ron on Twitter @RonFunches

episodes.title: Nikki Glaser - Episode 872
episodes.description:
I catch up with my dear friend, comedian and podcaster, Nikki Glaser. We talk about getting back on stage, our ADHD, and her living with her parents in St Louis.

 

Follow Nikki on Twitter @NikkiGlaser

episodes.title: Alan Zweibel - Episode 871
episodes.description:
Alan Zweibel was one of the 1st writers hired on SNL in 1975 and is responsible for some of the most iconic characters and bits in the show’s history. He also mentored me when I was in high school. It was amazing reconnecting with him to talk about his new memoir.

 

Follow Alan on Twitter @AlanZweibel

episodes.title: Loni Love - Episode 870
episodes.description:
We spent years doing VH1 shows and Chelsea Lately panels together. Loni Love joins Fitzdog Radio for a short conversation about the entertainment industry and her new memoir, “I Tried to Change So You Don’t Have To: True Life Lessons."

 

Follow Loni on Twitter @LoniLove

episodes.title: Michael Imperioli & Steve Schirripa - Episode 869
episodes.description: Sopranos stars Michael Imperioli and Steve Schirripa talk about a restaurant in Harlem (Rao’s) where you can’t get a table unless you are Scorsese, the mayor, or were on the Sopranos. P.S. Greg’s dad died there.

episodes.title: Mark Normand - Episode 868
episodes.description:
I talk with Mark Normand about New York comedy and his massively successful YouTube special, "Mark Normand: Out to Lunch." 

 

Follow Mark on Twitter @MarkNorm

episodes.title: Joey Diaz - Episode 867
episodes.description:
My friend Joey Diaz talks about social media and his nauseating toenails.

 

Follow Joey on Twitter @MadFlavor

episodes.title: Rory Scovel - Episode 866
episodes.description:
The great Rory Scovel returns to the show to talk about his time on The Eric Andre Show and how great his ass once was.

 

Follow Rory on Twitter @RoryScovel

episodes.title: Carl Reiner Remembered
episodes.description:
My interview w/ Carl Reiner has been one of the high points of my career. I’m rereleasing it today free. He also signed my boxed set of the 2,000 yr old man albums that my father gave me when I was a teenager.

 

Remember Carl on Twitter @CarlReiner

episodes.title: Jonathan Katz - Episode 865
episodes.description:
One of my heroes from my Boston days Jonathan Katz hangs out and makes me cry laughing. And then he laughs at me crying.

 

Follow Jonathan on Twitter @Jonathan_Katz

episodes.title: Russell Peters - Episode 864
episodes.description:
In my first face-to-face interview since March, I head to Russell Peters' mansion man cave where he tells me about Patrice O'Neal and Keith Robinson roasting his first stand-up special.

 

Follow Russell on Twitter @TheRealRussellP

episodes.title: James Veitch - Episode 863
episodes.description:
From across the pond, I talk to comedian and author James Veitch about his book "Dot Con: The Art of Scamming A Scammer.

 

Follow James on Twitter @VeitchTweets

episodes.title: Andy Kindler - Episode 862
episodes.description:
You asked for it! Andy Kindler explains ghosting me and we are joined by Mike Gibbons to add some diversity.

 

Follow Andy on Twitter @AndyKindler

Follow Mike on Twitter @gibbonstime

episodes.title: Dulcé Sloan - Episode 861
episodes.description:
From The DailyShow Dulcé Sloan makes me laugh and talks about what’s going on in this insane world right now.

 

Follow Dulcé on Twitter @DulceSloan

episodes.title: Joe Rogan Is Back
episodes.description: Joe Rogan comes in studio and talks about how some feminists now claim that if a woman has even one drink sex can be considered rape. Joe also shames Greg about his Prius.

episodes.title: Sam Simon
episodes.description: Greg and Executive Producer on The Simpsons, Sam Simon, discuss the burdens of having so many Emmys and how they can dispose of them. Mike Gibbons joins in on a conversation about whether or not Eddie Murphy is a good choice as the host of the 63rd Primetime Emmy Awards. Then there’s a Talk Your Way Out of It, some Overheards and How I Listen entry discussion.
